recipes.name: Basic Poison
recipes.description: Craft a basic contact poison. As a Bonus Action, coat one weapon or up to 3 pieces of ammunition. Adds 1d4 Poison damage for 1 minute or until damage is dealt.

recipes.name: Serpent Venom
recipes.description: Refine raw serpent venom into a potent injury poison. DC 11 Constitution save or 10 (3d6) Poison damage.

recipes.name: Assassin's Blood
recipes.description: Brew an ingested poison. DC 10 Constitution save or 6 (1d12) Poison damage and Poisoned for 24 hours.

recipes.name: Drow Poison
recipes.description: Extract and refine toxins used by the Drow. DC 13 Constitution save or Poisoned for 1 hour; Unconscious if save fails by 5+.

recipes.name: Crawler Mucus
recipes.description: Process carrion crawler secretions into a contact poison. DC 13 Constitution save or Poisoned and Paralyzed for 1 minute.
